mapper.insert: insert into prescription (doctor_id, medication_name, dosage, frequency, duration, instructions, remarks) values (#{doctorId}, #{medicationName}, #{dosage}, #{frequency}, #{duration}, #{instructions}, #{remarks})
mapper.select:
select * from prescription
doctor_id like concat('%', #{doctorId}, '%')
and medication_name like concat('%', #{medicationName}, '%')
and remarks like concat('%', #{remarks}, '%')
